Name: Moscow Lassi
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: One to serve with your Indian takeaway.
History: Created in 2001 by Jamie Stephenson at Graucho Grill, Manchester, England.
